name: The Freelancer
description:
"The Freelancer" is a top-down rogue-like action game taking place in the personal dungeon of a mob boss. You find yourself waking up in said dungeon with major amnesia and nothing but the clothes you wear, and a planted pair of sunglasses. After picking up your enemy's bullets, you find yourself being able to dispatch of the henchmen with ease by throwing them, With the help of your guide, Phillipe, will you make it out alive?

This is my very first unity game,  and my first Ludum Dare entry for a few years now. It is therefore, full of nonsense. Please give any and all feedback!

-Tom
